summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Engineering Department, authorizing the acquisition of an easement for storm drain purposes for the improvement of two alleys located between Delridge Way Southwest and 18th Avenue Southwest, from Southwest Cloverdale Street to Southwest Thistle Street ("Alley in Block 7, Plat of Liberty Division No. 1, et al, Project, Local Improvement District No. 6719"); increasing objects of expenditure in the 1980 Budget of the Engineering Dept., etc.
